attributes.additional_details: what a state we are getting into with this government, they are not for the working man, they are not for the ordinary person, Now he telling everyone to go to work, where do you look for work, when there is no work, and the wages are not enough to cover living expenses /  all these young people going to be unemployed 1 million how discusting it can be, when the prime minister saying climb the ladder you will be better of working say goodbye to the Conservatice and the Liberials the soon the better get rid of the Labour leader, get a new labour leader and they will do some good , him and the conservative will open the gates and let all the immigration into this country when charity begins at home, and the BEDROOM TAX they /you will keep taking and taking on everything, so lets say goodbye and vote for a better country /party and who looks after the poor and  struggleing  families the sooner the better,
